document_data.name: Foreshadow
document_data.mainbody:
'''Lord Foreshadow''' was a foppish noble from the City of Splendors, [[Waterdeep]], active in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''The great City of Splendors has much more in the manner of social luxuries suited towards my particular tastes.''|Lord Foreshadow}}
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, Lord Foreshadow was traveling along the [[Trade Way]], north of the town of [[Nashkel]]. When coming across adventurers, Foreshadow complemented their garb that added to the local color, and planned on imitating the adventurers' costumes for Lord [[Ribald]]'s masquerade in the city of [[Neverwinter]] the following year. Lord Foreshadow visited Neverwinter once before and claimed to have been the talk of the town. He also bragged about visiting [[Athkatla]], the City of Coin, several times in the past.
